results.title: Protective effect of metformin against ovariectomy induced depressive- and anxiety-like behaviours in rats: role of oxidative stress.
results.text_hl: We believe that the therapeutic efficiency of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ needs to be tested for potential clinical use in surgical menopause or @<m>DISEASE_Gonadal_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006058 @@@gonadal hormone deficiency@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@.
